name: Toto's Bird Café
description:
This game was started during the bird jam 2022 in November. At the moment there's only a playable demo but the team will continue working on the game and hopefully publish a complete version soon, so stay tuned!

...

Decades ago, all the birds suddenly vanished from the face of the Earth, the cause, unknown. Every avian creature simply plucked from existence, that is except for one.

Toto, the dodo bird, entrepreneur and last surviving member of the feathery race. One casual morning on her opening her café, where she serves various drinks, she finds a parcel outside her door. Inside, an amber egg, a feather and a book of recipes.

She quickly learns that this is no ordinary egg, and after accidentally spilling a drink made from the recipes onto the egg and the feather, something miraculous happens. 

There's a shine, a shimmer and finally, a bird appears. Toto and her new friend, Pigeon, must collect feathers to revive the birds, all while trying to keep her café afloat.

Credits:

Programmer, Game Idea, Artist: crazybugdevelopments

Writer, Game Idea & Story: tetsudanger

Second Programmer: Eruvande

Sound effects from Bensound.com and freesound.org

Music from richarrest from Itch.io
